name.ja: <ruby>黒<rt>くろ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>騎<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>

summoning_condition.en: This card's name becomes "Dragon Knight of Darkness" while in the Graveyard.

requirement.en: If you have a Level 5 Dragon Type monster in your Graveyard, pay 500 LP.

effect.en: Destroy 1 face-up Level 6 or lower monster on your opponent's field. Then, you can Special Summon 1 Level 5 "Dragon Knight of Darkness" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.
